title: Der Rufer
text: Der Rufer () is a bronze sculpture by <a href="Gerhard%20Marcks">Gerhard Marcks</a>. One statue is installed in the <a href="Tiergarten%20%28park%29">Tiergarten</a> in <a href="Berlin">Berlin</a>, Germany. Others are installed in <a href="Bremen">Bremen</a>, Germany, and <a href="Perth">Perth</a>, Western Australia. The statue is of a barefooted man in a robe, cupping his hands to his mouth as if shouting, and is dedicated to victims and survivors of <a href="torture">torture</a>.
